Text: TERRA SYSTEMSTERRA SYSTEMS Pink Sheets TSYI Latest price cents Take a close look at TERRA SYSTEMS Pink Sheets TSYI latest price cents which has just released the following news The group behind TSYI is the same people who put together ETGP When they got involved in ETGP the stock was trading at a similar price cents It lifted to cents in a short period of time ETGP did a for reverse not needed in TSYI so that it traded in July of on the Bulletin Board The stock went to in September of and split two for one The whole transaction took less than a year TERRA SYSTEMS INC ANNOUNCES POSITIVE ASSESSMENT OF ITS TECHNOLOGY BY SCIENTIFIC CONSULTING GROUP PAYSON UtahOct Terra Systems Inc PINK SHEETS TSYI announced today that a Santa Fe NMbased scientific consulting firm the La Mancha Company has completed an initial study commissioned by TSYI about the Companys patented Pneumatic Accelerator technology The title of the report is Dry Bulk Materials Handling Technology With Emphasis On Coal The reports conclusions are positive concerning TSYI technologys technical and economic feasibility In part because TSYI is still a developmentstage company La Manchas report cites certain caveats including that these general conclusions must be adequately measured and documented in rigorous pilottest environments such as those proposed by TSYI The Summary Statement of the La Mancha Report says In conclusion the process and its potential application to utilization in coalfired power generation the recovery of usable coal fines from longaccumulating waste sites and its environmentally friendly attributes constitute an intriguing and innovative approach to assisting in reconciling the current dichotomy of energy demand and environmental concern The proposed Phase I Program of Terra Systems should be supported as a first step Commenting on this study Clayton Timothy Chairman of TSYI said We are very pleased with the positive conclusions about our technology that this report has reached The La Mancha Company is a prestigious scientific consulting firm and in this case two of the authors of the report hold PhDs in relevant physical sciences and are also retirees from the Los Alamos National Laboratory We recognize the challenges TSYI faces in achieving successful commercialization including those mentioned in this report But we also feel this study provides substantial professional support for the faith we have in the scientific and economic efficacy of the Companys unique process for dry bulk materials handling Terra Systems Inc was incorporated in Utah in and is presently a developmentstage company It is primarily engaged in the development and commercialization of its patented Pneumatic Accelerator This device is a gas linear particle accelerator which conveys and processes bulk materials at high velocity in a particleisolated state using air as the medium of movement This technology operates efficiently at ambient temperatures and at low pressures and does not use water the generally more costly traditional alternative for processing bulk materials Virtually all organic and inorganic bulk materials used in basic industries can be more economically separated and classified by our dryprocess technology This capability facilitates a number of associated procedures including drying micro pulverizing mixing forming conveying and loading In addition bulk materials can be beneficiated in important ways including moisture reduction ash reduction Btu enhancement and electrocustomization Our system can perform multiple tasks needs less maintenance requires no chemical additives and can improve the surrounding environmental quality Opportunities are seen for many applications in an array of large industries including power generation agriculture mining environment construction ceramics and materials transportation We estimate that our technology could generate economic returns to industrial users in the form of revenues andor cost savings in the area of billion within a few years if adopted for implementation in several large projects Terra Systems anticipates it will share in these economic returns through fees royalties and profit sharing from licensing of its technology TSYI has approximately million shares currently outstanding SAFE HARBOR PROVISIONS Some of the statements contained in this press release discuss future expectations projections of sales results of operations financial conditions or licensee production or state other forwardlooking information as defined MILITARY RESALE GROUPBACTROL TECHNOLOGIES OTC BB BCTL MILITARY RESALE GROUP Latest price MRG as a private company with limited capital grew fold breaking Million in revenue MRG as BCTL a public company has greater access to capital and to registered securities to assist in future acquisitions and expansion MRG today announced they have increased their space times Watch for revenue to soar times again Military Market Segment Is Hot Xcel Associates target is MRG TRIPLES WAREHOUSE SPACE IN ANTICIPATION OF CONTINUED RAPID GROWTH COLORADO SPRINGS ColoOct Military Resale Group Inc OTCBB BCTL is pleased to announce it has moved from its previous squarefoot warehouse to one containing almost square feet This move will allow the Company to approximately triple its dry space double its cooler space and triple its freezer space Ethan D Hokit President stated that many household name companies have requested that we begin to service their accounts in our current market Consequently we continue our planned multiphase expansion to serve the Military Resale Market Military Resale Group Inc is negotiating with several companies to obtain new business and anticipates showing continued growth in sales which the new warehouse would accommodate In Military Resale Group Inc was housed in a squarefoot warehouse and a few months later acquired another square feet In October the Company acquired another square feet bringing its total to square feet This space was adequate until a few months ago when it became evident that more warehouse space was needed to support the growth that the Company is experiencing Military Resale Group Inc MRG was incorporated in when it acquired a yearold distributor to the Military Resale Market At that time MRGs annual sales were and they have since soared fivefold in three years to million in Military Resale Group is now a publicly owned company as a result of its recent acquisition by Bactrol Technologies Inc OTCBB BCTL The Military Resale Market is a billion niche market with authorized patrons which operates under the aegis of the Defense Commissary Agency DeCA a Department of Defense agency The DODs objective in this area is to operate resale store systems which sell groceries at commissaries and general merchandise at exchanges ie PXs at the lowest possible prices The resulting average cost savings of about are a major fringe benefit untaxed to military personnel The competitive structure of the Military Resale Market consists of a few large distributors who do not dominate the industry and hundreds of small ones The post acquisition strategy of MRG is to grow primarily by acquiring other small distributors and secondarily by internal growth SafeHarbor Provisions Some of the statements contained in this press PC EPHONEPC EPHONE OTC BB PCPH Latest price cents Check out this awesome device at Comparing the common shares of PC EPHONE outstanding as of October with the market capitalization of a company such as PALM this is a stock that really could be about to fly With news of carrier approval expected soon there could be a huge win here PCPH was over earlier this year and that was well before all the recent exciting events PCEPHONE HONORED AT COMDEX FALL SAN DIEGONov PCEPhone Inc OTCBB PCPH Frankfurt NL WKN is pleased to announce that it has been honored at Comdex Fall in Las Vegas by industry experts On the first day of Comdex the PCEPhone device won the Positive Image News Reviews Editors Choice Award The article referred to the PCEPhone device as light years ahead of the rest and stated that PC EPhone has bestowed upon us a historical moment to view a product of such magnitude in design and innovation The full article can be accessed at comdexpcephoneindexhtml In addition for an unprecedented second year the PCEPhone device was selected a finalist for Best of Comdex This year the PCEPhone device was nominated in the MobileHandheld System category along with products from Toshiba and Handspring Last year the device was the finalist in the Best of Comdex WirelessMobile Product category We are pleased and honored to have been selected and nominated by leading industry experts for such recognition said David Meltzer CEO and President of PC EPhone Inc We are proud of our development partner Cyberbank Corp and their dedication to making such fine worldclass wireless devices About PCEPhone Inc PCEPhone Inc through its wholly owned subsidiary is the exclusive US and Canadian distributor of the PC EPhone device and the Company also has the right to co develop Cyberbank Corps the developer of the PCEPhone and a major shareholder of the Company future devices The PCEPhone is the worlds first wireless convergent device which combines the capabilities of a handheld personal computer with full Internet access a cellular phone a PDA and an organizer allinone This news release contains forwardlooking statements which are made pursuant to the safe harbor provisions of the United States Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of All statements other than statements of historical fact are statements that could be deemed forwardlooking statements announcements in the very near future TRAVELSHORTSCOM INC TAKES ANOTHER STEP TOWARDS ITS QUEST TO ACQUIRE OIL GAS ASSETS VANCOUVER British ColumbiaNov Travelshortscom Inc the Company OTCBB TLSH announced today that it has enlisted the services of Edison Oil and Gas Ltd to evaluate a number of oil and gas exploration and development properties in the USA The management of Edison Oil and Gas Ltd has over years of oil and gas exploration and development experience in the states of Texas California Oklahoma Wyoming Kansas Colorado and Montana On Behalf of Travelshortscom Inc signed Robert
